content: 8 k row 6 31 k4 k per chart 1 k8 k per chart 2 k to end of round row 9 k2 k2tog repeat to end of round row 10 k continue knitting in mc for 4 inches for a more fitted style reduce row 11 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round length - approx 3 inches row 12 k cut yarn leaving a 10 tail and thread through tapestry needle slip all stitches onto tapestry needle and cinch to close hat thread needle through cinched stitches several times to secure thread needle through center of cinch so that it is inside of the hat tie knot to secure cut yarn weave ends #fishbonebeanie @srd_handmades 2019 chart 2 chart 1 use cc for shaded areas #fishbonebeanie @srd_handmades 2019
